javadoc.text: * Interface for points that can be clustered together.

param.T: * the type of point that can be clustered

javadoc.deprecated: As of 3.2 (to be removed in 4.0), * use {@link org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.Clusterable} instead

javadoc.text: * Returns the distance from the given point.
javadoc.param: p the point to compute the distance from
javadoc.return: the distance from the given point

javadoc.text: * Returns the centroid of the given Collection of points.
javadoc.param: p the Collection of points to compute the centroid of
javadoc.return: the centroid of the given Collection of Points
